content:
ICS 1C HW 3 for Mark Odsather

About Mark Odsather

Name:Mark Odsather
E-mail: easu1609@ea.oac.uci.edu
Major: Social Sciences

Three neat Web finds:

  1. Biology Images
  2. MGD Tap Room.
  3. NBA Highlights

Questions I can now answer
  1. What is the World Wide Web?
  2. What is a Hotlist?
  3. What is the role of the United Nations?
  4. What are some interesting cultural facts of the African-American people?
  5. What are some cool facts about Whales?
  1. What is the World Wide Web?
    My answer is... TheWorld Wide Web is a system which puts an endless information highway right at your fingertips. So you can seek out any information you want. From a variety of sources not only here at UCI, but also from countries all around the world. It's possible to find information on anything from recreational activities and travel sites to topics about the environment. So let the World Wide Web be your tour guide to unknown facts and places around the world.

    Return to list of questions.

  2. What is a Hotlist?
    My answer is... A Hotlist is an option given to you on the World Wide Web that allows you to keep a list of neat things you find on the web, by saving them to that list. It also let's you go back to that particular point that you found interesting at any point in time. Some interesing things that I found on the Web, and elected to save on my Hotlist include the Yahoo directory, TheUCI Antweb,Entertainment and Games catalog, TheBasketball server for you sport fans, and the Underground Home Page. Which I think is pretty cool.

    Return to list of questions.

  3. What is the role of the United Nations?
    My answer is...TheUnited Nations throughout its History has played a major role in World politics as well as the role of peacekeeper in times of conflict. This is a special time for the U.N. because they are also celebrating their 50th anniversary. The United Nations deals with much more than just peace keeping missions. It also deals with trade laws, and drug programs. Exploring some of these links will give you a better idea of just what the U.N. does and how it works.

    Return to list of questions. menu

  4. What are some interesting cultural facts of the African-American people?
    My answer is...Their are many interestin cultural facts about African American people and their heritage. In searching the World Wide Web I found many good starting points to better understand the African American people and their culture. The most interesting would have to be The Library of Congress. Another good spot to start is the Afro-American Home Page. If art is your thing there is a great exhibit in the web, that deals with African American art. If you want a better idea of how African American students feel about race relations try Afro-Net.

    Return to list of questions.

  5. What are some cool facts about Whales?
    My answer is... In searchin the World Wide Web I stumbled across a section on whales. I learned some pretty cool facts and stories about different types of whales. In different areas of the World. In Hawaii they have Whale watching cruises from February to March. Here are some neat pictures I found on the Web you might want to check out, one and two. I recommend exploring this area in greater depth because it is truly interesting.

    Return to list of questions.

Submitted February 16, 1995 for ICS 1C
